summary: Roleplaying him as a vampire slayer
descriptionHtml:
In the screenshot i have sundracons males and i think younger faces of some sort idk
this is my edit of Erik, (just in MY game) he's wearing spellsword armour from TERA armours mod, I gave him a dawnbreaker sword, and i used amazing follower tweaks to give him spells (mostly fire + light), he's a young eager vampire slaying farmboy alksdjalksjd have fun

This edit changes his face and hair.
REQUIRES APACHII HAIRS


EDIT: removed eyeliner
